automodpack.restart.update: An update be downloaded to the modpack, shiver me timbers!
automodpack.restart.select: The modpack required by the server be selected, savvy?
automodpack.restart.automodpack: Updated the AutoModpack mod to the one the server demands!
automodpack.restart.description: To play, ye must restart this here game, matey.
automodpack.restart.secDescription: D'ye wish to restart now, ye scurvy dog?
automodpack.delete.description: Ye'll lose all yer booty from the downloaded modpack, arggh.
automodpack.delete.secDescription: Ye'll need to restart the game.
automodpack.delete.thiDescription: Are ye sure ye wish to scuttle it, swab?
automodpack.danger: This server provides an external modpack, weigh anchor!
automodpack.danger.secDescription: It might be risky! DO NOT download if ye trust not the server captains!
automodpack.download.noFiles: No files to download, blast it!
automodpack.redownload.description: It may fix issues with the modpack, savvy.
automodpack.error: Something went wrong, by the kraken!
automodpack.error.files: Failed to download some files, blow me down.
automodpack.error.critical: A critical error whilst downloading the modpack!
automodpack.error.logs: Check for more details in the logs, arrr.
automodpack.fetch: Fetchin' direct links from Modrinth and CurseForge...
automodpack.validation.failed: Verification failed - Fingerprint does not match
automodpack.validation.title: Security Verification Required
automodpack.validation.description: This server's certificate fingerprint needs to be verified before downloading.
automodpack.validation.fingerprint.label: Server Certificate Fingerprint:
automodpack.validation.instruction: Please confirm the fingerprint with your server administrator.
automodpack.validation.confirm.text: To confirm, type the fingerprint above in the box below:
automodpack.validation.checkbox: I have verified this fingerprint is correct
automodpack.validation.skip.title: ⚠ Security Warning ⚠
automodpack.validation.skip.warning1: You are about to skip certificate verification.
automodpack.validation.skip.warning2: This means you are connecting without verifying the server's identity.
automodpack.validation.skip.warning3: Your connection could be intercepted or modified by a third party!
automodpack.validation.skip.instruction: Only proceed if you fully trust this server.
automodpack.validation.skip.confirm.text: Type the following in the box below to proceed:
automodpack.validation.skip.failed: Text does not match - Please type exactly as shown
